name: AmCharts-PHP
short_description: AmCharts-PHP is a library of classes to configure AmCharts. Configuring AmCharts using XML files is very annoying when using for manydifferent charts. AmCharts-PHP allows you to configure your charts and just use the resulting code on your page.
